reports.title: On March 31, 2022
reports.query: MATCH (d:DailyC19) WHERE d.date = '2020-03-31' AND d.state = "California" RETURN d.county AS county, d.cases AS cases, d.deaths AS deaths

reports.title: Connected counties via air routes
reports.query:
MATCH (c1:County {county_ascii: $neodash_county_county_ascii})-[r1:C2A]-(a1:Airport)-[r2:A2A_PT]-(a2:Airport)-[r3:C2A]-(c2:County)
RETURN c1, r1, a1, r2, a2, r3, c2

reports.title: Select county by name
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`County`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`county_ascii`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`county_ascii` as value ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: Top 5 correlations
reports.query:
MATCH (c:County {county_ascii: $neodash_county_county_ascii})-[r:C2C_PT]-(oc:County)
WITH c, oc ORDER BY r.sos ASC LIMIT 4
WITH c, COLLECT(oc) AS cc
WITH c, cc
	MATCH (d:DailyC19 {fips: c.county_fips})
		WHERE d.date >= $neodash_start_date
WITH c, cc, d
	MATCH (d1:DailyC19 {fips: cc[0].county_fips, date: d.date}), (c1:County {county_fips: cc[0].county_fips})
WITH c, cc, d, c1, d1
	MATCH (d2:DailyC19 {fips: cc[1].county_fips, date: d.date}), (c2:County {county_fips: cc[1].county_fips})
WITH c, cc, d, c1, d1, c2, d2
	MATCH (d3:DailyC19 {fips: cc[2].county_fips, date: d.date}), (c3:County {county_fips: cc[2].county_fips})
WITH c, cc, d, c1, d1, c2, d2, c3, d3
	MATCH (d4:DailyC19 {fips: cc[3].county_fips, date: d.date}), (c4:County {county_fips: cc[3].county_fips})
RETURN DATE(d.date) AS date, 
	d.cases*100.0/c.population AS self,
	d1.cases*100.0/c1.population AS cty1,
	d2.cases*100.0/c2.population AS cty2,
	d3.cases*100.0/c3.population AS cty3,
	d4.cases*100.0/c4.population AS cty4
    LIMIT TOINTEGER($neodash_duration)

reports.title: County
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`County`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`county_ascii`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`county_ascii` as value ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: Correlated Counties of Los Angeles
reports.query:
MATCH (c1:County {county_ascii: $neodash_county_county_ascii})-[r:C2C_PT]-(c2:County)
	WHERE c1.community = c2.community
RETURN c1, r, c2

reports.title: Correlated Connected Counties
reports.query:
MATCH (c1:County {county_ascii: $neodash_county_county_ascii})-[r1:C2A]-(a1:Airport)-[r2:A2A_PT]-(a2:Airport)-[r3:C2A]-(c2:County)
	WHERE c1.community = c2.community
RETURN c1, r1, a1, r2, a2, r3, c2
